typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BillOrderHeadID as integer,
		POSID as integer,
		PropertyID as integer,
		RegionID as integer,
		BrandID as integer,
		CountryID as integer,
		BillDateID as integer,
		SettleDateID as integer,
		BillNo as string,
		BillAmount as decimal(38,8),
		BillTime as string,
		SettleTime as string,
		Pax as integer,
		TableID as integer,
		KOTTypeID as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		DessertsItemSold as boolean,
		TeaItemSold as boolean,
		DimsumItemSold as boolean,
		TotalTax as decimal(38,8),
		TotalDiscount as decimal(38,8),
		RoundOffAmount as decimal(38,8),
		Complimentory as decimal(38,8),
		TotalTipAmount as decimal(38,8),
		GroupSizeID as integer,
		CashID as integer,
		CreditCardID as integer,
		ComplimentID as integer,
		ReservationHourID as integer,
		NetAmount as decimal(38,8),
		AdditionalCharge as decimal(18,8),
		SettlementHourID as integer,
		AvgPerCover as decimal(38,8),
		AvgPerCover01 as decimal(38,8),
		TableTurnAroundDuration as double,
		BillMadeSettleDuration as double,
		BillID as integer,
		MealID as integer,
		DimStyleofOperationID as integer,
		DimDiscCardID as integer,
		WaiterId as integer,
		OverCounterSalesID as integer,
		BillMade_POSShiftId as integer,
		BillSettled_POSShiftId as integer,
		UserId as integer,
		SourceApplicationId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  ISNULL(t1.BillOrderHeadID, 0) AS BillOrderHeadID\n, ISNULL(t2.POSID, 0) AS POSID\n, ISNULL(t3.PropertyID, 0) AS PropertyID\n, ISNULL(t4.RegionID, 0) AS RegionID\n, ISNULL(t5.BrandID, 0) AS BrandID\n, ISNULL(t6.CountryID, 0) AS CountryID\n, ISNULL(t7.DateTimeID, 0) AS BillDateID\n, ISNULL(t8.DateTimeID, 0) AS SettleDateID\n, t1.BillNo\n, ISNULL(t1.BillAmount, 0) AS BillAmount\n, t1.BillTime\n, t1.SettleTime\n, ISNULL(t1.Pax, 0) AS Pax\n, ISNULL(t9.TableID, 0) AS TableID\n, ISNULL(t10.KOTTypeID, 0)  AS KOTTypeID\n, ISNULL(t11.EmployeeID, 0) AS EmployeeID\n, ISNULL(t12.DessertsItemSold, 0) AS DessertsItemSold\n, ISNULL(t12.TeaItemSold, 0) AS TeaItemSold\n, ISNULL(t12.DimsumItemSold, 0) AS DimsumItemSold\n, ISNULL(t1.TotalTax, 0) AS TotalTax\n, ISNULL(t1.TotalDiscount, 0) AS TotalDiscount\n, ISNULL(t1.RoundOffAmount, 0) AS RoundOffAmount\n, ISNULL(t1.Complimentory, 0) AS Complimentory\n, ISNULL(t1.TotalTipAmount, 0) AS TotalTipAmount\n, CASE	WHEN t1.Pax >= 1 AND  t1.Pax <= 2 THEN 1 \n		WHEN t1.Pax >= 3 AND t1.Pax <= 4 THEN 2 \n		WHEN t1.Pax >= 5 AND t1.Pax <= 9 THEN 3 \n		WHEN t1.Pax >= 10 AND t1.Pax <= 100 THEN 4 ELSE 0 END AS GroupSizeID\n, ISNULL(t13.CashID, 0) AS CashID\n, ISNULL(t14.CreditCardID, 0) AS CreditCardID\n, CASE WHEN t1.PayCompliment = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ComplimentID\n, DatePart(HH,isnull(t1.SettleTime,\'0:00\'))+1 ReservationHourID\n, t1.BillAmount + t1.RoundOffAmount - t1.TotalTax AS NetAmount\n, IsNull(t1.AdditionalCharge,0) as AdditionalCharge\n, DATEPART(HH,ISNULL(t1.SettleTime, N\'12:00:00\')) + 1 AS SettlementHourID\n, CASE WHEN t1.pax IS NULL OR t1.pax = 0 THEN (t1.BillAmount + t1.RoundOffAmount - t1.TotalTax) \n		ELSE (t1.BillAmount + t1.RoundOffAmount - t1.TotalTax) / t1.Pax END AS AvgPerCover\n, CASE WHEN t1.Pax IS NULL OR t1.pax = 0 THEN (t1.BillAmount + t1.RoundOffAmount - t1.TotalTax) \n		ELSE (t1.BillAmount + t1.RoundOffAmount - t1.TotalTax) / t1.Pax END AS AvgPerCover01\n, CASE WHEN Year(MinKotDateTime) > 1900 AND year(T1.BillSettleDateTime) > 1900 \n		THEN CAST(T1.BillSettleDateTime - MinKotDateTime AS float) * 1440 \n		ELSE 0 END AS TableTurnAroundDuration\n, CASE WHEN Year(T1.BillMadeDateTime) > 1900 AND year(T1.BillSettleDateTime)> 1900 \n		THEN CAST(T1.BillSettleDateTime - T1.BillMadeDateTime AS float) * 1440 \n		ELSE 0 END AS BillMadeSettleDuration\n, ISNULL(t15.DimBillNoID, 0) AS BillID\n, t1.BillSettledShift AS MealID\n, ISNULL(t16.DimStyleofOperationID, 0) AS DimStyleofOperationID \n, IsNull(T17.DimDiscCardID,0) AS DimDiscCardID\n, IsNull(T18.WaiterId,0) AS WaiterId\n, isnull(t19.OverCounterSalesId,0) OverCounterSalesID\n, ISNULL(T1.BillMadeShift,0) as BillMade_POSShiftId\n, ISNULL(T1.BillSettledShift,0) as BillSettled_POSShiftId \n, ISNULL(T22.UserId,0) as UserId\n, IsNull(T23.SourceApplicationId,0) as SourceApplicationId\nFROM dbo.DimBillOrderHead AS t1 WITH (nolock) LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimPosMst AS t2 WITH (nolock) ON t1.POSCode = t2.POSCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimPropertyMst AS t3 WITH (nolock) ON t1.PropertyCode = t3.PropertyCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimRegionMst AS t4 WITH (nolock) ON t1.RegionCode = t4.RegionCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimBrandMst AS t5 WITH (nolock) ON t1.BrandCode = t5.BrandCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimCountryMst AS t6 WITH (nolock) ON t1.CountryCode = t6.CountryCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimDateTime AS t7 WITH (nolock) ON t1.BillDateTime = t7.CDate LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimDateTime AS t8 WITH (nolock) ON t1.SettleDate = t8.CDate LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimTableMst AS t9 WITH (nolock) ON t1.TableRoomCode = t9.TableCode and T9.POSCode = T1.POSCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimKOTTypes AS t10 WITH (nolock) ON t1.KOTType = t10.KOTTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimEmployeeMst AS t11 WITH (nolock) ON t1.EmployeeCode = t11.EmployeeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimBillOrderOthers AS t12 WITH (nolock) ON t1.POSCode = t12.POSCode AND t1.BillNo = t12.BillNo LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimCash AS t13 WITH (nolock) ON t1.PayCash = t13.CashCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimCreditCard AS t14 WITH (nolock) ON t1.PayCreditCard = t14.CreditCardCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimBillNo AS t15 WITH (nolock) ON t1.POSCode = t15.PosCode AND t1.BillNo = t15.BillNo LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimStyleOfOperation AS t16 WITH (nolock) ON t1.OrderFrom = t16.OrderFrom LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimDiscCardMst t17 with(nolock) on t1.DiscCardCode = t17.DiscCardCode and t1.DiscCardDetailsCode = t17.DiscCardDetailsCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.DimWaiterMst T18 on T1.WaiterCode = T18.EmployeeCode and T1.PosCode = T18.PosCode LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.OverCounterSalesMaster t19 with(nolock) on t1.OverCounter = t19.OverCounterSalesCode LEFT OUTER JOIN \n  dbo.DimUser t22 with(nolock) on t1.billsettledby = t22.UserShortName LEFT OUTER JOIN\n  dbo.SourceApplication t23 with(nolock) on t1.UpdFrm = t23.SourceApplicationCode\n',
	format: 'query') ~> dsFactBillOrderHead
dsFactBillOrderHead sink(input(
		FactBOHID as integer,
		BillOrderHeadID as integer,
		POSID as integer,
		PropertyID as integer,
		RegionID as integer,
		BrandID as integer,
		CountryID as integer,
		BillDateID as integer,
		SettleDateID as integer,
		GroupSizeID as integer,
		BillNo as string,
		BillAmount as decimal(38,8),
		BillTime as string,
		SettleTime as string,
		Pax as integer,
		TableID as integer,
		KOTTypeID as integer,
		DessertsItemSold as boolean,
		TeaItemSold as boolean,
		DimsumItemSold as boolean,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		TotalTax as decimal(38,8),
		TotalDiscount as decimal(38,8),
		RoundOffAmount as decimal(38,8),
		Complimentory as decimal(38,8),
		ComplimentoryType as integer,
		TotalTipAmount as decimal(38,8),
		CashID as integer,
		CreditCardID as integer,
		TableTurnAroundDuration as integer,
		BillMadeSettleDuration as integer,
		PayCompliment as integer,
		ComplimentID as integer,
		SettlementHourID as integer,
		BillID as integer,
		MealId as integer,
		PosRegionID as integer,
		DimStyleofOperationID as integer,
		DimDiscCardID as integer,
		WaiterId as integer,
		BillSettled_POSShiftId as integer,
		BillMade_POSShiftId as integer,
		AdditionalCharge as decimal(18,0),
		OverCounterSalesID as integer,
		UserId as integer,
		SourceApplicationId as integer,
		ReservationHourID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		BillOrderHeadID,
		POSID,
		PropertyID,
		RegionID,
		BrandID,
		CountryID,
		BillDateID,
		SettleDateID,
		GroupSizeID,
		BillNo,
		BillAmount,
		BillTime,
		SettleTime,
		Pax,
		TableID,
		KOTTypeID,
		DessertsItemSold,
		TeaItemSold,
		DimsumItemSold,
		EmployeeID,
		TotalTax,
		TotalDiscount,
		RoundOffAmount,
		Complimentory,
		TotalTipAmount,
		CashID,
		CreditCardID,
		TableTurnAroundDuration,
		BillMadeSettleDuration,
		ComplimentID,
		SettlementHourID,
		BillID,
		MealId = MealID,
		DimStyleofOperationID,
		DimDiscCardID,
		WaiterId,
		BillSettled_POSShiftId,
		BillMade_POSShiftId,
		AdditionalCharge,
		UserId,
		SourceApplicationId,
		ReservationHourID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FactBillOrderHead
